title: No entries info not shown and entries missing

labels.name: bug-confirmed
labels.description: A confirmed and reproducible bug report

body:
<!-- Please read the [bug reports section of the contribution
guidelines](/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports) before submitting an issue. -->

###### Info

* __Version__: 2.0
* __Source__: GitHub
* __Vault encrypted__: Yes (with biometric unlock)
* __Device__: OnePlus 8T
* __Android version and ROM__: 11, LineageOS 18.1-20210508-microG-kebab

###### Settings (if they are relevant)

* View mode: Compact
* Copy tokens when tapped: enabled
* Highlight tokens when tapped: disabled
* Delete vault on panic trigger: disabled
* Icon Pack: aegis-icons (v20210524)
* Encrypted + biometric unlock enabled
* Tap to reveal: enabled
* Auto lock: back button, device locked

###### Steps to reproduce


* Add some entries
* Tap the search icon
* Type some random letters so that no entries are shown
* (no "no entries found" warning now shown) (1)
* Tap the three dots icon
* Tap lock
* Tap on `biometrics` and unlock
* (now "no entries found" is there)
* Tap the X icon or remove the search text
* Still no entries found (2)

###### What do you expect to happen?

1. After typing something when it doesn't find an entry and it should show the "No entries found" info.
2. After unlocking again and removing the search text it should show the relevant entries.

###### What happens instead?

1. "No entries found" info not shown.
2. It still says that there were no entries found.

When restarting the app the entries are once again shown correctly.

###### Screen recording

(temporarily disabled show account names and screen security)


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/24937357/119639422-e3c81d00-be17-11eb-8add-dc734a84223c.mp4
